0.1.name: wordpress/mw-theme-uri-shortcode
0.1.description:
MW Theme URI Shortcode to make a shortcord outputting theme directory uri. shortcode : [template_directory_uri], [stylesheet_directory_uri]

When you switches Visual to Text, replaced into shortcode. When you switches Text to Visual, shortcode replaced into theme uri. IF you don't use child theme, there are cases where [stylesheet_directory_uri] replaces [template_directory_uri]
